'''Ma'chah''' is an open-world [[NPC]] located in {{Location|Atocpan}}. After completing the {{Quest|Is "Intensity" Really the Key?}}, he becomes available as a [[Master Trainer]].

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* ''Ma'chah'' name comes from the {{w|Yucatec_Maya_language|Yucatec Mayan}} language.
** ''Ma''' ({{w|Yucatec_Maya_language|Yucatec Maya}}: ''Ma’ '' "No") is the negative particle: No.<ref>Mayas.uady.mx: [https://www.mayas.uady.mx/diccionario/m_maya.html M]</ref>
** ''Chah'' could be derived from Chak (Mayan Yucatec ''chak'' "red") or Chaak (Mayan Yucatec: ''Chaak'' "rain").<ref>Mayas.uady.mx: [https://www.mayas.uady.mx/diccionario/ch_glotal_maya.html CH]</ref>
